channel.title: Eclipse 667 Loading 706 -=Updated to 706 Revision=-
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt]Welcome to the official Development thread for Eclipse 667 Loading [b]706[/b]!![/size]
3/30/12 - Updated to 706 revision [img]http://i.imgur.com/pXYZw.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/AJfHI.png[/img]
[img]http://www.eclipse667.com/logo.png[/img]
Some Video's I found (Player Made): http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5f7fDBHOR60&feature=related http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pPSkddI1Rhc&feature=related http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=68qyZbU-2h8&feature=related http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ta332r9vzjc&feature=related http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MHCiBe6GBZs&feature=related
So I decided to start a Development team for this Project. Seeing as it's become a large task to take on by myself, especially seeing as we are buying a Mopar Toplist spot this month, and I won't be able to update as often as needed by myself.
There's no real application format, Basically just post some contact information, Prior history in RSPS development, Strengths and weakness's, Why you want to be a part of this project, and What you think you can do to benefit this server.
Now, some server stuff, Pictures, Status, etc...
[size=18pt]Server Status :ONLINE[/size]
[B][U][SIZE=16pt][COLOR=Blue]Server Status Key:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/U][/B] [COLOR=Red]ALPHA[/COLOR] - Closed Alpha || Staff Only [COLOR=Yellow]BETA[/COLOR] - Public Beta [COLOR=Lime]ONLINE [/COLOR]- Economy Server Begins and we move out of the BETA stage.
[img]http://eclipse667.com/newconsole.png[/img] [img]http://eclipse667.com/adv10.png[/img] [img]http://eclipse667.com/adv11.png[/img]
======================================================================================================================= [size=14pt][u]Recent Updates:[/u][/size] Finished Armadyl and Zamorak Godwars Bosses <3 Fixed trading Fixed Castle Wars (Almost perfect) Clan wars officially Finished Finished up all Dominion tower modes (Beta Still)
=======================================================================================================================
[B][U][COLOR=Red]Features:[/COLOR][/U][/B] Eclipse server: - Eclipse 706 is currently Not released for the public. It is in the Admin-only ALPHA testing stages, We hope that by the time our BETA release comes around for the public, we will be have our Economy stabilized enough to release with the BETA.
PvP/Pking: - Eclipse 706 has a Perfect PvP system. - We also have a lot of pkers who are into Hybridding, a well-known and fun type of pking - Switching is near perfect (99% RS Speeds) - All Spellbooks are accessible via Commands - Storm of Armadyl, New boots, and more. - Armours such as Torva, Barrows, and PvP Armour Degrade when in use and when they are dropped in PvP
PvM: - King Black Dragon with all attacks and effects - Tormented Demons with all 3 switches - Full Nex with all 4 stages (Flawless) - Close to 100% Godwars - Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks - Frost dragons - Dominion Tower - Barrows & More...
PvP And PvM: - Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless - Switching better than RS - Full Summoning!! - Armour set effects all added! - Degrading Pvp Armours - Storm Of Armadyl Spell - Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers)
Miscellaneous: - All special attacks working properly for Most Weapons! - Quick Chat 100% - Flawless Music & Sound system - Perfect XP counter
=======================================================================================================================
Server Media [img]http://www.eclipse667.com/adv1.png[/img] [img]http://www.eclipse667.com/adv2.png[/img] [img]http://www.eclipse667.com/adv3.png[/img] [img]http://www.eclipse667.com/adv4.png[/img] [img]http://www.eclipse667.com/adv5.png[/img] [img]http://www.eclipse667.com/adv6.png[/img] [img]http://www.eclipse667.com/adv7.png[/img] [img]http://www.eclipse667.com/adv8.png[/img] [img]http://www.eclipse667.com/adv9.png[/img] [img]http://www.eclipse667.com/704pics/1.png[/img] [img]http://www.eclipse667.com/704pics/2.png[/img] [img]http://www.eclipse667.com/704pics/3.png[/img] [img]http://www.eclipse667.com/704pics/4.png[/img] [img]http://www.eclipse667.com/704pics/5.png[/img] [img]http://www.eclipse667.com/704pics/6.png[/img] [img]http://www.eclipse667.com/704pics/7.png[/img] [img]http://www.eclipse667.com/704pics/8.png[/img] [img]http://www.eclipse667.com/704pics/9.png[/img] [/center]
